title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills
headline: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills
subtitle: KnoWay Out
content:
KnoWay has launched a fleet of driverless taxis that send surveillance footage from every street corner directly to the FIB — not ideal for enterprising crime lords hoping to maintain anonymity.

Join forces with expert hacker Avi Schwartzman to dismantle KnoWay’s surveillance grid around Los Santos. Infiltrate their security and ruin their reputation in five new KnoWay Out Jobs to earn GTA$ and RP.

Head to the payphone in Little Seoul on the Map to get started.
